And its endpoint is <ENDPOINT>
When I send the <REQUEST_TYPE> request to RestAPI
Then all the mandatory fields should be returned in the response

scenario.title: Verify the REST response after the POST request

examples.step: Given I have a Base URI <baseURI> for the REST API
And its base path is <BASE_PATH>
And its endpoint is <ENDPOINT>
And its body message is <BODY>
When I send the <REQUEST_TYPE> request to RestAPI
Then the REST API should return me a valid response
examples.example: {baseURI=http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api, BASE_PATH=/webapi/hotels, ENDPOINT=/add, REQUEST_TYPE=POST, BODY={"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}}
examples.step: Given I have a Base URI http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api for the REST API
And its base path is /webapi/hotels
And its endpoint is /add
And its body message is {"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}
When I send the POST request to RestAPI
